channel.title: Help please, about servers on moparscape
channel.description:
I have version Moparscape 3.2 w/Aryan, first off how do I create my own server so me and my friend can play on it?? Everytime I try to make a "New Server" it keeps saying that theres an error and server is down everytime I log in.
lastly how do I create monsters, and create items?
these are the codes I've been useing to make items 055550 = water runes 013470 = noted defense potions 059830 = bronze fire arrows 065280 = white robe bottoms 039690 = noted raw sea turtle 003500 = excaliber 309874 = black claws
can't figure out how to spawn monsters, and this site is very confussing to browse.

item.title: Help please, about servers on moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Rare_z Rare z
item.description:
@Rare_z wrote:

Jimmy you are talking about 127.0.0.1… Go to Tutorials > Read the pinned topic name “The Ultimate Server Guide”.

Read full topic
item.source: Help please, about servers on moparscape

item.title: Help please, about servers on moparscape
item.dc:creator: @jimmyspizza jimmyspizza
item.description:
@jimmyspizza wrote:

The spawning this I.E. ::notedrawseaturtle or ::ironore or ::iron ore don’t work, as for the npc’s they spawn with no hp and the dont attack or move, and when you kill them they drop nothing, and they keep respawning how do I remove them?

Read full topic
item.source: Help please, about servers on moparscape

item.title: Help please, about servers on moparscape
item.dc:creator: @mod_abyssal mod abyssal
item.description:
@mod_abyssal wrote:

you can type ::npc 50 or any id in-game if you just want to see it, but some NPCs crash it

Read full topic
item.source: Help please, about servers on moparscape

And you cant create items

item.title: Help please, about servers on moparscape
item.dc:creator: @jimmyspizza jimmyspizza
item.description:
@jimmyspizza wrote:

I have version Moparscape 3.2 w/Aryan, first off how do I create my own server so me and my friend can play on it?? Everytime I try to make a “New Server” it keeps saying that theres an error and server is down everytime I log in.

lastly how do I create monsters, and create items?

these are the codes I’ve been useing to make items
055550 = water runes
013470 = noted defense potions
059830 = bronze fire arrows
065280 = white robe bottoms
039690 = noted raw sea turtle
003500 = excaliber
309874 = black claws

can’t figure out how to spawn monsters, and this site is very confussing to browse.

Read full topic
item.source: Help please, about servers on moparscape
